archimate:Device.name: Large Conference Room Monitor (LCOM)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Specifications:
• Screen Size: 75 inches. • Touchscreen Option • Resolution: 4K UHD (3840x2160) for sharp visuals • Panel Type: IPS or VA (wide viewing angles, high contrast) • Aspect Ratio: 16:9 • Refresh Rate: 60 Hz (standard) • Connectivity Options: HDMI, DisplayPort, USB-C, wireless screen sharing • Adjustability: Wall-mounted or mobile stand, tilt/swivel capability • Eye Comfort Features: Blue-light filter, flicker-free technology
